stepTitle: There is a $$250-m-high$$ cliff at Half Dome in Yosemite National Park in California. Suppose a boulder breaks loose from the top of this cliff. (b) Assuming a reaction time of $$0.300$$ s, how long will a tourist at the bottom have to get out of the way after hearing the sound of the rock breaking loose (neglecting the height of the tourist, which would become negligible anyway if hit)? The speed of sound is $$335$$ $$\frac{m}{s}$$ on this day.
